YU LE XING QIANG

If you play pinhead, I will cast you into the river of lost souls and watch you drown with all the lost souls that you belong with. I will ensure you see the gates of hell in the desolate state you thrive in, and ensure everything in your life will wither away well before you see these said gates of hell.

Overall a pretty fun game with friends, :D I would recommend it to anyone looking to kickback and kill some time with pals. Movement system seems wonky at first but mastering it is very rewarding, learning to do things like loop is a very fulfilling learning curve. 9/10

I'll be completely honest and say that, initially, I hated this game. I bought it for all of the killer horror icon DLC that Steam offers. I played 3 rounds and was like..nah, this isn't for me. But, I took a break from it and re-approached it with fresh eyes and holy shit.

First off, its fun to play either side. While the Survivors are definitely under powered, it changes up the gameplay so you're not getting bored doing one thing or the other. But, the killers are definitely where its at. I was surprised to find that I enjoyed the included characters (I really just bought it for the DLC) and they were not only creepy but a lot of fun to play.

Long story short? Immersive gameplay, Replayability like whoa and all of the Horror DLC you could possibly imagine. A+

Really fun and cool game when it works. Games can have nice and good killers or trolly mean killers. Best to play survivor with a friend, and make sure to communicate. ALSO DO NOT PRESTIGE CHARACTERS YOU WILL LOSE ALL ITEMS AND OFFERINGS, ONLY PRESTIGE WHEN RUN OUT OF ITEMS, ALSO YOU GET A KOOL CLOTHING ITEM FOR DAS CHARACTER. All in all, great and fun game, cant wait for new killers

** Update **
After wasting a majority of my life playing this game out of pure anger, I must revise my previous review. First off, there will always be metas in the game (survivor and killer sided) if you wish to truly play this game and enjoy your time, DO NOT use the metas. Doing so will not make you any better, you will depend on crutch perks and tactics that will only make you worse. Experiment with builds, find perks that work well with each other, and if your playing killer try all of them. Each killer is unique, try them all out a bit, and when you find one that you like, play them. A fun thing to do is go for adepts, if you don't care about winning or losing but just learning new killers and perks, do the adept challenges. My only wish was that there was something other than an achievement for adept, like maybe a cosmetic for that character (regardless I have finished everyone adept and it honestly adds some spice to the games).

Final note: Dont be a douche. Be respectful and dont be toxic. It makes everyones experience worse. And I dont just mean in chat, like play the game to have fun, not to win. Trust me it will make you enjoy the game a lot more. 

Hope to see you guys out there.
I've had this game for years on Playstation and let me tell you... the controls on PC are so much better. One thing I do have to say is the amount of desync the killers have sometimes.

While occasionally frustrating due to the behavior of other players; both on your side and the opposing... it's a lot of fun. Whether you like being scared out of your wits when a stealthy killer grabs you by the shoulder from somewhere you didn't expect, or you want to enjoy running around in circles like an idiot with 4 other people, this game can be equal parts terrifying, campy, or frustrating. It's worth it. Trust me.

EntÃ£o amigx, se tu ta lendo essa analise Ã© porque ta com receio de comprar.
Esse jogo eu nÃ£o recomendo pra nenhuma pessoa nova na Ã¡rea comprar, Ã© um disperdicio de dinheiro frustante na sua vida, e com esse tanto de horas no jogo, eu vi essa "coisa" mudar... mas para PIOR nÃ©!

O jogo tem MILHÃ•ES de coisas que o tornam ruim e estressante, mas falando apenas alguns jÃ¡ faz dele um completo lixo:

1- Sistema de Rank: O jogo Ã© baseado totalmente em partidas "RANKEADAS", entÃ£o Ã© claro que vai ter sistema de Rank(Por mais que o modo de Matar seus Amigos seja totalmente ignorado no game). Fun game. Lots of unique killers to play, and balance seems pretty good. It's kind of chill, and feels almost like a game of hide and seek but with axes and chainsaws. Simple, but addictive.
